ComputeConfig.description: Configuration parameters for provisioning a AWS DMS Serverless replication

Tag.description: The key or keys of the key-value pairs for the resource tag or tags assigned to the resource.

resource.description: A replication configuration that you later provide to configure and start a AWS DMS Serverless replication

properties.name: ReplicationConfigIdentifier
properties.description: A unique identifier of replication configuration

type.description: A unique identifier of replication configuration

properties.name: ReplicationConfigArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Replication Config

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Replication Config

properties.name: SourceEndpointArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the source endpoint for this AWS DMS Serverless replication configuration

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the source endpoint for this AWS DMS Serverless replication configuration

properties.name: TargetEndpointArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the target endpoint for this AWS DMS Serverless replication configuration

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the target endpoint for this AWS DMS Serverless replication configuration

properties.name: ReplicationType
properties.description: The type of AWS DMS Serverless replication to provision using this replication configuration

type.description: The type of AWS DMS Serverless replication to provision using this replication configuration

properties.name: ReplicationSettings
properties.description: JSON settings for Servereless replications that are provisioned using this replication configuration

type.description: JSON settings for Servereless replications that are provisioned using this replication configuration

properties.name: SupplementalSettings
properties.description: JSON settings for specifying supplemental data

type.description: JSON settings for specifying supplemental data

properties.name: ResourceIdentifier
properties.description: A unique value or name that you get set for a given resource that can be used to construct an Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for that resource

type.description: A unique value or name that you get set for a given resource that can be used to construct an Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for that resource

properties.name: TableMappings
properties.description: JSON table mappings for AWS DMS Serverless replications that are provisioned using this replication configuration

type.description: JSON table mappings for AWS DMS Serverless replications that are provisioned using this replication configuration

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: Contains a map of the key-value pairs for the resource tag or tags assigned to the dataset.

type.description: Contains a map of the key-value pairs for the resource tag or tags assigned to the dataset.
